A '''prize pottery sherd''' is a [[pottery sherd]] that depicts a gemstone. It can be found in [[desert pyramid]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Breaking a [[decorated pot]] drops all [[brick]]s and pottery sherds used to craft it, meaning it drops a prize pottery sherd if one was used to craft it.

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|prize-pottery-sherd}}

== Usage ==
=== Crafting ingredient ===
Prize pottery sherds can be used to craft decorated pots.

{{Crafting
|ingredients=Any Pottery Sherd or [[brick]]
|B1= Any Pottery Sherd
|A2= Any Pottery Sherd 
|C2= Any Pottery Sherd
|B3= Any Pottery Sherd
|Output= Decorated Pot
|type= Decoration block
|ignoreusage=1
}}
